pages.text: This Rite will engrave the $(marked)Yellow Sign$() Spell into my mind.

This magnificent Spell will grant me the ability to place Yellow Signs in the World. The Rite will require a greater amount of Focal Power -I should be really careful with the amounts of Focal Power in this one. The Spell will require three experience levels and Yellow Dye.$(br)I should still be extremely careful with this spell; it may fail easily if I am not blessed by the Yellow King, and Yellow Signs will equally affect me if I am not directly affiliated.
Yellow Signs may be placed on any solid block; I can probably even apply them to $(marked)Banners$().
